review: h1a short review on life is strange before the stormh1  a great addition to the original life is strange offering insight into what happened before the events of the first game  great for achievement hunters  simply playing through the game unlocks most of them plus you can replay individual chapters to grab any you missed  910

review: i cant believe they made this one match the story of the first installment of life is strange  i didnt even finish the second chapter yet and i already am impressed and shedding a few tears so far  mixed emotions and also laughter just as the producersdevelopers intended  truly another masterpiece to connect to the meaningful story and expression that we call life  i could not stop playing it because it has been very addictive to see whats next
